variants.dropdown: Uses same field styles with a caret icon
variants.search: Uses same field styles with a search icon
variants.prefix: Field with static prefix like $ or %
variants.suffix: Field with static suffix text or icon

rules: Large input height (40px) should only be used when explicitly required
Icons inside fields must be 16px with 8px spacing from text
Active state uses brand primary border
Error state uses red border and red helper text
Disabled state uses light gray background and muted text
Labels and input text both use 14px typography
Helper text appears below the field
Label and input field must have 4px vertical spacing
Same field styles apply to dropdowns and search inputs

usageExamples.searchField: Use a 16px search icon on the left with 8px spacing from the text
usageExamples.currencyField: Use a static $ prefix inside the field
usageExamples.errorField: Show red border and helper text like 'Required field'
usageExamples.disabledField: Use light gray background and placeholder text color
